item.title: Data! How it is important in this Digital Universe
item.description: We live in the Date Age. It is very hard to measure the total volume of the data that is stored electronically in the universe. The estimated size of the data of Digital Universe in 2006 is 0.18 zettabytes, in 2011 it increased to 1.8 zettabytes, in 2013 it increased more to 4.4 zettabytes! According to the new estimates this Digital Universe is going to increase by 10 factor inÂ 2020. By 2020 it will be increased to 44 zettabytes.
